def_cn: （尤指战争引起的）大屠杀，大毁灭，浩劫
def_en: A holocaust is an event in which there is a lot of destruction and many people are killed, especially one caused by war.

def_cn: （第二次世界大战中纳粹对犹太人进行的）大屠杀
def_en: The Holocaust is used to refer to the killing by the Nazis of millions of Jews during the Second World War.
